query:
INSERT INTO contracts (producerId, actorId, projectTitle, role, startDate, endDate, paymentAmount, paymentTerms, status, terms, producerSigned, actorSigned, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE userRole = 'producer' AND openId = 'demo_prod_1') as producerId,
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE userRole = 'actor' AND openId = 'demo_actor_1') as actorId,
  'The Last Stand' as projectTitle,
  'Lead Actor' as role,
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -10 DAY) as startDate,
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 35 DAY) as endDate,
  '50000' as paymentAmount,
  'Net 30' as paymentTerms,
  'active' as status,
  'Feature film contract for lead role. Includes 45 days of principal photography.' as terms,
  1 as producerSigned,
  1 as actorSigned,
  NOW(), NOW()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE userRole = 'producer' AND openId = 'demo_prod_2'),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE userRole = 'actor' AND openId = 'demo_actor_2'),
  'Comedy Central Special',
  'Stand-up Performer',
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 DAY),
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY),
  '15000',
  'Net 30',
  'pending',
  'Stand-up comedy special recording. 2 days of filming.',
  1,
  0,
  NOW(), NOW()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE userRole = 'producer' AND openId = 'demo_prod_3'),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE userRole = 'actor' AND openId = 'demo_actor_9'),
  'Nike Brand Campaign',
  'Principal Actor',
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 15 DAY),
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 17 DAY),
  '7500',
  'Net 30',
  'pending',
  'Commercial shoot for national brand campaign.',
  0,
  0,
  NOW(), NOW()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE userRole = 'producer' AND openId = 'demo_prod_4'),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE userRole = 'actor' AND openId = 'demo_actor_10'),
  'Broadway to Hollywood',
  'Featured Interview',
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -20 DAY),
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -18 DAY),
  '5000',
  'Net 30',
  'completed',
  'Documentary interview about Broadway career.',
  1,
  1,
  NOW(), NOW()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE userRole = 'producer' AND openId = 'demo_prod_5'),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE userRole = 'actor' AND openId = 'demo_actor_3'),
  'Action Heroes Season 2',
  'Stunt Coordinator',
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -5 DAY),
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 85 DAY),
  '35000',
  'Net 30',
  'active',
  'TV series stunt coordination and performance. 90 days production.',
  1,
  1,
  NOW(), NOW();
